00039 Packet::Packet(uint16_t items, bool xbus)
00040 {
00041         PACKETLOG("Create Packet %p\n",this);
00042 
00043         m_itemCount = items;
00044         m_infoList = NULL;
00045         m_formatList = new CmtDataFormat[m_itemCount];
00046         m_toa = 0;
00047         m_rtc = 0;
00048         m_xm = xbus;
00049 }

00052 Packet::~Packet()
00053 {
00054         PACKETLOG("Destroy Packet %p\n",this);

00056         LSTCHKDELNUL(m_infoList);

00060 CmtDataFormat Packet::getDataFormat(const uint16_t index) const
00061 {
00062         if (index >= m_itemCount || m_formatList == NULL)
00063         {
00064                 CmtDataFormat temp;
00065                 return temp;
00066         }
00067         return m_formatList[index];
00068 }

00071 bool Packet::setDataFormat(const CmtDataFormat& format, const uint16_t index)
00072 {
00073         if (index < m_itemCount)
00074         {
00075                 m_formatList[index] = format;
00076                 LSTCHKDELNUL(m_infoList);
00077                 return true;
00078         }
00079         return false;
00080 }

00083 bool Packet::setDataFormat(const CmtOutputMode outputMode, const CmtOutputSettings outputSettings, const uint16_t index)
00084 {
00085         if (index < m_itemCount)
00086         {
00087                 m_formatList[index].m_outputMode = outputMode;
00088                 m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings = outputSettings;
00089                 LSTCHKDELNUL(m_infoList);
00090                 return true;
00091         }
00092         return false;

00102 void Packet::setXbus(bool xbus, bool convert)
00103 {
00104         if (xbus != m_xm)
00105         {
00106                 if (convert)
00107                 {
00108                         CmtMtTimeStamp stamp = getSampleCounter(0);
00109 
00110                         // move the time stamp value(s) around
00111                         if (xbus)
00112                         {
00113                                 // new version is Xbus, so old version is regular format -> place timestamp at start of packet and remove from all individual data units
00114                                 // remove the timestamp from all data units
00115 
00116                                 // insert timestamp at the start
00117                                 m_msg.insertData(2,0);
00118                                 m_msg.setDataShort(stamp,0);
00119                         }
00120                         else
00121                         {
00122                                 // new version is regular, so old version is Xbus format -> place timestamp at end of all individual data units and remove from start of packet
00123                                 // append the timestamp to all data units
00124 
00125                                 // remove timestamp from the start
00126                                 m_msg.deleteData(2,0);
00127                         }
00128                 }
00129                 // update the state cache
00130                 m_xm = xbus;
00131                 LSTCHKDELNUL(m_infoList);
00132         }
00133 }

00136 // Return the floating/fixed point value size
00137 uint16_t Packet::getFPValueSize(const uint16_t index) const
00138 {
00139         uint16_t ds;
00140         switch (m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings & CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_MASK)
00141         {
00142                 case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_FLOAT:
00143                         ds = 4;
00144                         break;
00145 
00146                 case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_DOUBLE:
00147                         ds = 8;
00148                         break;
00149                 case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_FP1632:
00150                         ds = 6;
00151                         break;
00152 
00153                 case CMT_OUTPUTSETTINGS_DATAFORMAT_F1220:
00154                         ds = 4;
00155                         break;
00156 
00157         }
00158         return ds;
00159 }

00401 // Return the Raw Accelerometer component of a data item.
00402 CmtShortVector Packet::getRawAcc(const uint16_t index) const
00403 {
00404         CmtShortVector buffer;
00405         if (containsRawAcc(index))
00406                 for (uint16_t i=0;i<3;++i)
00407                         buffer.m_data[i] = m_msg.getDataShort(m_infoList[index].m_rawAcc + (2*i));
00408         
00409         return buffer;
00410 }
00411 bool Packet::containsRawAcc(const uint16_t index) const
00412 {
00413         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00414                 return false;
00415         if (m_infoList[index].m_rawAcc == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00416                 return false;
00417         return true;
00418 }
00419 bool Packet::updateRawAcc(const CmtShortVector& vec, const uint16_t index)
00420 {
00421         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00422                 return false;
00423         if (m_infoList[index].m_rawAcc == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00424         {
00425                 // add
00426                 m_infoList[index].m_rawAcc = m_msg.getDataSize();
00427                 m_msg.resizeData(m_msg.getDataSize() + 3*2);
00428                 m_infoList[index].m_size += 3*2;
00429         }
00430         // update
00431         for (uint16_t i=0;i<3;++i)
00432                 m_msg.setDataShort(vec.m_data[i], m_infoList[index].m_rawAcc + (2*i));
00433         return true;
00434 }

00542 // Return the Raw Data component of a data item.
00543 CmtRawData Packet::getRawData(const uint16_t index) const
00544 {
00545         CmtRawData buffer;
00546         if (containsRawData(index))
00547         {
00548                 const uint8_t* tmp = m_msg.getDataBuffer(m_infoList[index].m_rawData);
00549                 const uint16_t* sh = (const uint16_t*) tmp;
00550                 uint16_t* bare = (uint16_t*) &buffer;
00551 
00552                 for (uint16_t i=0;i<10;++i, ++sh, ++bare)
00553                         *bare = swapEndian16(*sh);// m_msg.getDataShort(m_infoList[index].m_rawData + (2*i));
00554         }
00555         return buffer;
00556 }
00557 bool Packet::containsRawData(const uint16_t index) const
00558 {
00559         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00560                 return false;
00561         if (m_infoList[index].m_rawData == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00562                 return false;
00563         return true;
00564 }
00565 bool Packet::updateRawData(const CmtRawData& data, const uint16_t index)
00566 {
00567         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00568                 return false;
00569         if (m_infoList[index].m_rawData == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00570         {
00571                 // add
00572                 m_infoList[index].m_rawData = m_msg.getDataSize();
00573                 m_msg.resizeData(m_msg.getDataSize() + 3* 3*2 + 2);
00574                 m_infoList[index].m_rawAcc = m_infoList[index].m_rawData;
00575                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGyr = m_infoList[index].m_rawData + 3*2;
00576                 m_infoList[index].m_rawMag = m_infoList[index].m_rawData + 6*2;
00577                 m_infoList[index].m_rawTemp= m_infoList[index].m_rawData + 9*2;
00578                 m_infoList[index].m_size += 3* 3*2 + 2;
00579         }
00580         // update
00581         int16_t* bare = (int16_t*) &data;
00582         for (uint16_t i=0;i<10;++i)
00583                 m_msg.setDataShort(bare[i], m_infoList[index].m_rawData + (2*i));
00584         return true;
00585 }
00586 
00588 // Return the Raw Gps Data component of a data item.
00589 CmtRawGpsData Packet::getRawGpsData(const uint16_t index) const
00590 {
00591         CmtRawGpsData buffer;
00592         if (containsRawGpsData(index))
00593         {
00594                 //const uint8_t* tmp = m_msg.getDataBuffer(m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData);
00595                 //const uint16_t* sh = (const uint16_t*) tmp;
00596                 //uint16_t* bare = (uint16_t*) &buffer;
00597 
00598                 // pressure data
00599                 buffer.m_pressure = m_msg.getDataShort(m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressure);
00600                 // pressAge
00601                 buffer.m_pressureAge = m_msg.getDataByte(m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressureAge);
00602 
00603                 // lon,lat,height,hacc,vacc,veln,vele,veld
00604                 //tmp = m_msg.getDataBuffer(m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsGpsData);
00605                 //const uint32_t* ln = (const uint32_t*) tmp;
00606                 uint32_t *bareln = (uint32_t*) &buffer.m_itow;
00607                 for (uint16_t i=0; i < 10; ++i)
00608                         bareln[i] = m_msg.getDataLong(m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsGpsData + (4*i));
00609 
00610                 // gpsAge
00611                 buffer.m_gpsAge = m_msg.getDataByte(m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsGpsAge);
00612         }
00613         return buffer;
00614 }
00615 bool Packet::containsRawGpsData(const uint16_t index) const
00616 {
00617         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00618                 return false;
00619         if (m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00620                 return false;
00621         return true;
00622 }
00623 bool Packet::updateRawGpsData(const CmtRawGpsData& data, const uint16_t index)
00624 {
00625         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00626                 return false;
00627         if (m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00628         {
00629                 // add
00630                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData = m_msg.getDataSize();
00631                 m_msg.resizeData(m_msg.getDataSize() + (2+1) + (40 + 1));
00632                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressure = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData;
00633                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressureAge = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 2;
00634 
00635                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsGpsData = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 3;
00636                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsItow = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 3;
00637                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsLatitude = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 3 + 4;
00638                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsLongitude = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 3 + 8;
00639                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsHeight = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 3 + 12;
00640                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsVeln = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 3 + 16;
00641                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsVele = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 3 + 20;
00642                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsVeld = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 3 + 24;
00643                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsHacc = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 3 + 28;
00644                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsVacc = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 3 + 32;
00645                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsSacc = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 3 + 36;
00646                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsGpsAge = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 3 + 40;
00647                 
00648                 m_infoList[index].m_size += (2+1) + (40 + 1);
00649         }
00650         // update
00651         m_msg.setDataShort(data.m_pressure, m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressure);
00652         m_msg.setDataByte(data.m_pressureAge, m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressureAge);
00653 
00654         // lon,lat,height,hacc,vacc,veln,vele,veld
00655         int32_t* bareln = (int32_t*)&data.m_itow;
00656         for (uint16_t i=0; i<10;++i)
00657                 m_msg.setDataLong(bareln[i],m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsGpsData + (4*i));
00658 
00659         // gpsAge
00660         m_msg.setDataByte(data.m_gpsAge,  m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsGpsAge);
00661         return true;
00662 }
00663 
00665 // Return the Raw Pressure Data component of a data item.
00666 CmtRawPressureData Packet::getRawPressureData(const uint16_t index) const
00667 {
00668         CmtRawPressureData buffer;
00669         if (containsRawPressureData(index))
00670         {
00671                 // pressure data
00672                 buffer.m_pressure = m_msg.getDataShort(m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressure);
00673                 // pressAge
00674                 buffer.m_pressureAge = m_msg.getDataByte(m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressureAge);
00675         }
00676         return buffer;
00677 }
00678 bool Packet::containsRawPressureData(const uint16_t index) const
00679 {
00680         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00681                 return false;
00682         if (m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressure == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00683                 return false;
00684         return true;
00685 }
00686 bool Packet::updateRawPressureData(const CmtRawPressureData& data, const uint16_t index)
00687 {
00688         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00689                 return false;
00690         if (m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressure == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00691         {
00692                 // add
00693                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData = m_msg.getDataSize();
00694                 m_msg.resizeData(m_msg.getDataSize() + (2+1));
00695                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressure = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData;
00696                 m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressureAge = m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsData + 2;
00697 
00698                 m_infoList[index].m_size += (2+1);
00699         }
00700         // update
00701         m_msg.setDataShort(data.m_pressure, m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressure);
00702         m_msg.setDataByte(data.m_pressureAge, m_infoList[index].m_rawGpsPressureAge);
00703 
00704         return true;
00705 }

00708 // Return the Temperature component of a data item.
00709 double Packet::getTemp(const uint16_t index) const
00710 {
00711         if (containsTemp(index))
00712                 return m_msg.getDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, m_infoList[index].m_temp);
00713 
00714         return 0.0;
00715 }
00716 bool Packet::containsTemp(const uint16_t index) const
00717 {
00718         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00719                 return false;
00720         if (m_infoList[index].m_temp == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00721                 return false;
00722         return true;
00723 }
00724 bool Packet::updateTemp(const double& temp, const uint16_t index)
00725 {
00726         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00727                 return false;
00728 
00729         uint16_t ds = getFPValueSize(index);
00730 
00731         if (m_infoList[index].m_temp == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00732         {
00733                 // add
00734                 m_infoList[index].m_temp = m_msg.getDataSize();
00735                 m_msg.resizeData(m_msg.getDataSize() + ds);
00736                 m_infoList[index].m_size += ds;
00737         }
00738         // update
00739         m_msg.setDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, temp, m_infoList[index].m_temp);
00740         return true;
00741 }

00744 // Return the Calibrated Accelerometer component of a data item.
00745 CmtVector Packet::getCalAcc(const uint16_t index) const
00746 {

00749                 m_msg.getDataFPValue(&buffer.m_data[0], m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, m_infoList[index].m_calAcc, 3);
00750         else
00751                 memset(&buffer, 0, sizeof(buffer));
00752         return buffer;
00753 }

00755 {

00757                 return false;

00769

00771         {
00772                 // add

00774                 m_msg.resizeData(m_msg.getDataSize() + numValues*ds);
00775                 m_infoList[index].m_size += numValues*ds;
00776         }
00777         // update
00778         m_msg.setDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, &vec.m_data[0], m_infoList[index].m_calAcc, numValues);
00779         return true;
00780 }

00859 
00861 // Return the Calibrated Accelerometer component of a data item.
00862 CmtCalData Packet::getCalData(const uint16_t index) const
00863 {
00864         CmtCalData buffer;
00865         double* bare = (double*) &buffer;
00866         if (containsCalData(index))
00867         {
00868                 if (m_infoList[index].m_calAcc == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00869                         memset(bare, 0, 3*sizeof(double));
00870                 else
00871                         m_msg.getDataFPValue(bare, m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, m_infoList[index].m_calAcc, 3);
00872 
00873                 bare += 3;
00874                 if (m_infoList[index].m_calGyr == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00875                         memset(bare, 0, 3*sizeof(double));
00876                 else
00877                         m_msg.getDataFPValue(bare, m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, m_infoList[index].m_calGyr, 3);
00878 
00879                 bare += 3;
00880                 if (m_infoList[index].m_calMag == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00881                         memset(bare, 0, 3*sizeof(double));
00882                 else
00883                         m_msg.getDataFPValue(bare, m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, m_infoList[index].m_calMag, 3);
00884         }
00885         else
00886                 memset(&buffer, 0, sizeof(buffer));
00887         return buffer;
00888 }
00889 bool Packet::containsCalData(const uint16_t index) const
00890 {
00891         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00892                 return false;
00893         if (m_infoList[index].m_calData == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00894                 return false;
00895         return true;
00896 }
00897 bool Packet::updateCalData(const CmtCalData& data, const uint16_t index)
00898 {
00899         const uint16_t numValues = 9;
00900         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00901                 return false;
00902 
00903         uint16_t ds = getFPValueSize(index);
00904 
00905         if (m_infoList[index].m_calData == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00906         {
00907                 // add
00908                 m_msg.m_autoUpdateChecksum = false;
00909                 m_infoList[index].m_calData = m_msg.getDataSize();
00910                 m_msg.resizeData(m_msg.getDataSize() + numValues*ds);
00911                 m_infoList[index].m_calAcc = m_infoList[index].m_calData;
00912                 m_infoList[index].m_calGyr = m_infoList[index].m_calData + 3*ds;
00913                 m_infoList[index].m_calMag = m_infoList[index].m_calData + 6*ds;
00914                 m_infoList[index].m_size += numValues*ds;
00915 
00916                 double* bare = (double*) &data;
00917                 m_msg.setDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, bare, m_infoList[index].m_calData, numValues);
00918                 return true;
00919         }
00920         // update
00921         else
00922         {
00923                 double* bare = (double*) &data;
00924                 if (m_infoList[index].m_calAcc != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00925                         m_msg.setDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, bare, m_infoList[index].m_calAcc, 3);
00926                 bare += 3;
00927                 if (m_infoList[index].m_calGyr != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00928                         m_msg.setDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, bare, m_infoList[index].m_calGyr, 3);
00929                 bare += 3;
00930                 if (m_infoList[index].m_calMag != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00931                         m_msg.setDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, bare, m_infoList[index].m_calMag, 3);
00932 
00933                 return true;
00934         }
00935 }
00936

00978 // Return the Orientation component of a data item as CmtEuler angles.
00979 CmtEuler Packet::getOriEuler(const uint16_t index) const
00980 {
00981         CmtEuler buffer;
00982         if (containsOriEuler(index))
00983         {
00984                 uint16_t ds = getFPValueSize(index);
00985                 buffer.m_roll  = m_msg.getDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, m_infoList[index].m_oriEul);
00986                 buffer.m_pitch = m_msg.getDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, m_infoList[index].m_oriEul + ds);
00987                 buffer.m_yaw   = m_msg.getDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, m_infoList[index].m_oriEul + 2*ds);
00988         }
00989         return buffer;
00990 }
00991 bool Packet::containsOriEuler(const uint16_t index) const
00992 {
00993         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
00994                 return false;
00995         if (m_infoList[index].m_oriEul == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
00996                 return false;
00997         return true;
00998 }
00999 bool Packet::updateOriEuler(const CmtEuler& data, const uint16_t index)
01000 {
01001         const uint16_t numValues = 3;
01002         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
01003                 return false;
01004 
01005         uint16_t ds = getFPValueSize(index);
01006 
01007         if (m_infoList[index].m_oriEul == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01008         {
01009                 // add
01010                 m_infoList[index].m_oriEul = m_msg.getDataSize();
01011                 m_msg.resizeData(m_msg.getDataSize() + numValues*ds);
01012                 m_infoList[index].m_size += numValues*ds;
01013         }
01014         // update
01015         m_msg.setDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, data.m_roll,  m_infoList[index].m_oriEul);
01016         m_msg.setDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, data.m_pitch, m_infoList[index].m_oriEul + ds);
01017         m_msg.setDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, data.m_yaw,   m_infoList[index].m_oriEul + 2*ds);
01018         return true;
01019 }
01020 
01022 // Return the Orientation component of a data item as an Orientation Matrix.
01023 CmtMatrix Packet::getOriMatrix(const uint16_t index) const
01024 {
01025         CmtMatrix buffer;
01026         uint16_t k = 0;
01027         if (containsOriMatrix(index))
01028         {
01029                 uint16_t ds = getFPValueSize(index);
01030                 for (int32_t i=0;i<3;++i)
01031                         for (int32_t j=0;j<3;++j, k+=ds)
01032                                 buffer.m_data[i][j] = m_msg.getDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, m_infoList[index].m_oriMat+k);
01033         }       
01034         else
01035                 memset(&buffer, 0, sizeof(buffer));
01036 
01037         return buffer;
01038 }
01039 bool Packet::containsOriMatrix(const uint16_t index) const
01040 {
01041         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
01042                 return false;
01043         if (m_infoList[index].m_oriMat == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01044                 return false;
01045         return true;
01046 }
01047 bool Packet::updateOriMatrix(const CmtMatrix& data, const uint16_t index)
01048 {
01049         const uint16_t numValues = 9;
01050         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
01051                 return false;
01052 
01053         uint16_t ds = getFPValueSize(index);
01054 
01055         if (m_infoList[index].m_oriMat == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01056         {
01057                 // add
01058                 m_infoList[index].m_oriMat = m_msg.getDataSize();
01059                 m_msg.resizeData(m_msg.getDataSize() + numValues*ds);
01060                 m_infoList[index].m_size += numValues*ds;
01061         }
01062         // update
01063         uint16_t k = 0;
01064         for (int32_t i=0;i<3;++i)
01065                 for (int32_t j=0;j<3;++j, k+=ds)
01066                         m_msg.setDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, data.m_data[i][j], m_infoList[index].m_oriMat+k);
01067         return true;
01068 }
01069 
01070 bool Packet::containsOri(const uint16_t index) const
01071 {
01072         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
01073                 return false;
01074         if (m_infoList[index].m_oriEul == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE &&
01075                 m_infoList[index].m_oriMat == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE &&
01076                 m_infoList[index].m_oriQuat == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01077                 return false;
01078         return true;
01079 }

01091 bool Packet::containsAnalogIn1(const uint16_t index) const
01092 {
01093         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
01094                 return false;
01095         if (m_infoList[index].m_analogIn1 == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01096                 return false;
01097         return true;
01098 }
01099 bool Packet::updateAnalogIn1(const CmtAnalogInData& data, const uint16_t index)
01100 {
01101         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
01102                 return false;
01103         if (m_infoList[index].m_analogIn1 == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01104         {
01105                 // add
01106                 m_infoList[index].m_analogIn1 = m_msg.getDataSize();
01107                 m_msg.resizeData(m_msg.getDataSize() + 2);
01108                 m_infoList[index].m_size += 2;
01109         }
01110         // update
01111         m_msg.setDataShort(data.m_data, m_infoList[index].m_analogIn1);
01112         return true;
01113 }

01254                 m_infoList[index].m_size += 1;

01262 // Return the Sample Counter component of the packet.
01263 uint16_t Packet::getSampleCounter(const uint16_t index) const
01264 {

01266                 return 0;
01267         return m_msg.getDataShort(m_infoList[index].m_sc);
01268 }
01269 bool Packet::containsSampleCounter(const uint16_t index) const
01270 {
01271         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
01272                 return false;
01273         if (m_infoList[index].m_sc == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01274                 return false;
01275         return true;
01276 }
01277 bool Packet::updateSampleCounter(const uint16_t counter, const uint16_t index)
01278 {
01279         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
01280                 return false;
01281         if (m_infoList[index].m_sc == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01282         {
01283                 // add
01284                 m_infoList[index].m_sc = m_msg.getDataSize();
01285                 m_msg.resizeData(m_msg.getDataSize() + 2);
01286                 m_infoList[index].m_size += 2;
01287         }
01288         // update
01289         m_msg.setDataShort(counter, m_infoList[index].m_sc);
01290         return true;
01291 }

01309 bool Packet::containsAccG(const uint16_t index) const
01310 {
01311         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
01312                 return false;
01313         if (m_infoList[index].m_acc_g == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01314                 return false;
01315         return true;
01316 }
01317 bool Packet::updateAccG(const CmtVector& g, const uint16_t index)
01318 {
01319         const uint16_t numValues = 3;
01320         if (getDataSize(index) == 0)
01321                 return false;
01322 
01323         uint16_t ds = getFPValueSize(index);
01324 
01325         if (m_infoList[index].m_acc_g == CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01326         {
01327                 // add space
01328                 m_infoList[index].m_acc_g = m_msg.getDataSize();
01329                 m_msg.resizeData(m_msg.getDataSize() + numValues*ds);
01330                 m_infoList[index].m_size += numValues*ds;
01331         }
01332         // update
01333         m_msg.setDataFPValue(m_formatList[index].m_outputSettings, &g.m_data[0], m_infoList[index].m_acc_g, numValues);
01334         return true;
01335 }
01336 
01337 Packet::Packet(const Packet& pack)
01338 {
01339         PACKETLOG("Create new packet from Packet %p\n",&pack);
01340 
01341         m_itemCount = 0;
01342         m_formatList = NULL;
01343         m_infoList = NULL;
01344         *this = pack;
01345 }
01346 
01347 void Packet::operator = (const Packet& pack)
01348 {
01349         PACKETLOG("Copy packet from Packet %p\n",this);
01350 
01351         if (m_itemCount != pack.m_itemCount)
01352         {
01353                 LSTCHKDELNUL(m_formatList);
01354                 m_itemCount = pack.m_itemCount;
01355                 m_formatList = new CmtDataFormat[m_itemCount];
01356         }
01357         
01358         LSTCHKDELNUL(m_infoList);
01359         m_infoList = new PacketInfo[m_itemCount];
01360         for (uint16_t i = 0; i < m_itemCount; ++i)
01361         {
01362                 m_formatList[i] = pack.m_formatList[i];
01363                 m_infoList[i] = pack.m_infoList[i];
01364         }
01365         
01366         m_toa = pack.m_toa;
01367         m_rtc = pack.m_rtc;
01368         m_msg = pack.m_msg;
01369         m_xm = pack.m_xm;
01370 }
01371 
01372 #ifdef _CMT_DLL_EXPORT
01373 void Packet::interpolate(const Packet& pa, const Packet& pb, const double f)
01374 {
01375         pa.getDataSize();
01376         pb.getDataSize();
01377 
01378         *this = pb;
01379 
01380         if (m_itemCount != pa.m_itemCount)
01381                 return;
01382 
01383         getDataSize();
01384         CmtShortVector va, vb, vc;
01385         CmtVector fa, fb, fc;
01386         CmtQuat qf;
01387         CmtEuler ea, eb, ec;
01388         CmtMatrix mf;
01389 
01390         Quaternion qa, qb, qc;
01391         Matrix3x3 m;
01392 
01393         double g = 1.0-f;
01394         double da, db, dc;
01395         uint16_t sa, sb, sc;
01396 
01397         // walk over all items and interpolate all data items
01398         for (uint16_t i = 0; i < m_itemCount; ++i)
01399         {
01401                 if (pa.m_infoList[i].m_rawAcc != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE && pb.m_infoList[i].m_rawAcc != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01402                 {
01403                         va = pa.getRawAcc(i);           vb = pb.getRawAcc(i);
01404                         vc.m_data[0] = (uint16_t) (g*(double)va.m_data[0] + f*(double)vb.m_data[0]);
01405                         vc.m_data[1] = (uint16_t) (g*(double)va.m_data[1] + f*(double)vb.m_data[1]);
01406                         vc.m_data[2] = (uint16_t) (g*(double)va.m_data[2] + f*(double)vb.m_data[2]);
01407                         updateRawAcc(vc,i);
01408                 }
01409 
01410                 if (pa.m_infoList[i].m_rawGyr != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE && pb.m_infoList[i].m_rawGyr != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01411                 {
01412                         va = pa.getRawGyr(i);           vb = pb.getRawGyr(i);
01413                         vc.m_data[0] = (uint16_t) (g*(double)va.m_data[0] + f*(double)vb.m_data[0]);
01414                         vc.m_data[1] = (uint16_t) (g*(double)va.m_data[1] + f*(double)vb.m_data[1]);
01415                         vc.m_data[2] = (uint16_t) (g*(double)va.m_data[2] + f*(double)vb.m_data[2]);
01416                         updateRawGyr(vc,i);
01417                 }
01418 
01419                 if (pa.m_infoList[i].m_rawMag != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE && pb.m_infoList[i].m_rawMag != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01420                 {
01421                         va = pa.getRawMag(i);           vb = pb.getRawMag(i);
01422                         vc.m_data[0] = (uint16_t) (g*(double)va.m_data[0] + f*(double)vb.m_data[0]);
01423                         vc.m_data[1] = (uint16_t) (g*(double)va.m_data[1] + f*(double)vb.m_data[1]);
01424                         vc.m_data[2] = (uint16_t) (g*(double)va.m_data[2] + f*(double)vb.m_data[2]);
01425                         updateRawMag(vc,i);
01426                 }
01427 
01428                 if (pa.m_infoList[i].m_rawTemp != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE && pb.m_infoList[i].m_rawTemp != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01429                 {
01430                         da = (double) pa.getRawTemp(i);         db = (double) pb.getRawTemp(i);
01431                         dc = g*da + f*db;
01432                         updateRawTemp((uint16_t) dc,i);
01433                 }
01434 
01436                 if (pa.m_infoList[i].m_calAcc != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE && pb.m_infoList[i].m_calAcc != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01437                 {
01438                         fa = pa.getCalAcc(i);           fb = pb.getCalAcc(i);
01439                         fc.m_data[0] = (g*(double)fa.m_data[0] + f*(double)fb.m_data[0]);
01440                         fc.m_data[1] = (g*(double)fa.m_data[1] + f*(double)fb.m_data[1]);
01441                         fc.m_data[2] = (g*(double)fa.m_data[2] + f*(double)fb.m_data[2]);
01442                         updateCalAcc(fc,i);
01443                 }
01444 
01445                 if (pa.m_infoList[i].m_calGyr != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE && pb.m_infoList[i].m_calGyr != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01446                 {
01447                         fa = pa.getCalGyr(i);           fb = pb.getCalGyr(i);
01448                         fc.m_data[0] = (g*(double)fa.m_data[0] + f*(double)fb.m_data[0]);
01449                         fc.m_data[1] = (g*(double)fa.m_data[1] + f*(double)fb.m_data[1]);
01450                         fc.m_data[2] = (g*(double)fa.m_data[2] + f*(double)fb.m_data[2]);
01451                         updateCalGyr(fc,i);
01452                 }
01453 
01454                 if (pa.m_infoList[i].m_calMag != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE && pb.m_infoList[i].m_calMag != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01455                 {
01456                         fa = pa.getCalMag(i);           fb = pb.getCalMag(i);
01457                         fc.m_data[0] = (g*(double)fa.m_data[0] + f*(double)fb.m_data[0]);
01458                         fc.m_data[1] = (g*(double)fa.m_data[1] + f*(double)fb.m_data[1]);
01459                         fc.m_data[2] = (g*(double)fa.m_data[2] + f*(double)fb.m_data[2]);
01460                         updateCalMag(fc,i);
01461                 }
01462 
01464                 if (pa.m_infoList[i].m_oriQuat != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE && pb.m_infoList[i].m_oriQuat != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01465                 {
01466                         qf = pa.getOriQuat(i);
01467                         qa.isArray(qf.m_data);
01468 
01469                         qf = pb.getOriQuat(i);
01470                         qb.isArray(qf.m_data);
01471 
01472                         qc.isSlerp(qa,qb,f);
01473                         qc.setArray(qf.m_data);
01474 
01475                         updateOriQuat(qf,i);
01476                 }
01477 
01478                 if (pa.m_infoList[i].m_oriEul != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE && pb.m_infoList[i].m_oriEul != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01479                 {
01480                         ea = pa.getOriEuler(i);         eb = pb.getOriEuler(i);
01481                         ec.m_roll  = (g*(double)ea.m_roll  + f*(double)eb.m_roll);
01482                         ec.m_pitch = (g*(double)ea.m_pitch + f*(double)eb.m_pitch);
01483                         ec.m_yaw   = (g*(double)ea.m_yaw   + f*(double)eb.m_yaw);
01484                         updateOriEuler(ec,i);
01485                 }
01486 
01487                 if (pa.m_infoList[i].m_oriMat != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE && pb.m_infoList[i].m_oriMat != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01488                 {
01489                         mf = pa.getOriMatrix(i);
01490                         m.isArray(&mf.m_data[0][0]);
01491                         qa.isRmat(m);
01492 
01493                         mf = pb.getOriMatrix(i);
01494                         m.isArray(&mf.m_data[0][0]);
01495                         qb.isRmat(m);
01496 
01497                         qc.isSlerp(qa,qb,f);
01498                         m.isQuat(qc);
01499 
01500                         m.setArray(&mf.m_data[0][0]);
01501                         updateOriMatrix(mf,i);
01502                 }
01503 
01505                 if (pa.m_infoList[i].m_sc != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE && pb.m_infoList[i].m_sc != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01506                 {
01507                         sa = pa.getSampleCounter(i);    sb = pb.getSampleCounter(i);
01508                         sc = sb - sa;
01509                         dc = f*(double) sc;
01510                         sc = sa + (uint16_t) doubleToLong(dc);
01511                         updateSampleCounter(sc,i);
01512                 }
01513 
01514                 if (pa.m_infoList[i].m_acc_g != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE && pb.m_infoList[i].m_acc_g != CMT_DATA_ITEM_NOT_AVAILABLE)
01515                 {
01516                         fa = pa.getAccG(i);             fb = pb.getAccG(i);
01517                         fc.m_data[0] = (g*(double)fa.m_data[0] + f*(double)fb.m_data[0]);
01518                         fc.m_data[1] = (g*(double)fa.m_data[1] + f*(double)fb.m_data[1]);
01519                         fc.m_data[2] = (g*(double)fa.m_data[2] + f*(double)fb.m_data[2]);
01520                         updateAccG(fc,i);
01521                 }
01522         }
01523         // some remaining stuff
01524         // TOA remains equal to pb TOA
01525         m_rtc = (TimeStamp) (g*(double) pa.m_rtc + f*(double) pb.m_rtc);
01526 }
01527 #endif
01528 
01529 } // end of xsens namespace
